text: 7|101|(napiye!) Ivvurkalin carittirattai nam unkalukkuk kurukirom. (Avarril vacittirunta) avarkalukku anuppappatta tutarkal niccayamakat telivana vacanankalaiye kontu vantanar. Eninum, avarkalo munnar etavatu onrai poyyakkivittal (pinnar atai) orukkalattilum nampikkai kollatavarkalakave iruntanar. Ivvare, nirakarippavarkalin ullankalil allah muttiraiyittu vitukiran
